summary: Backend API testing for Baggo mobile app - KYC Enforcement, Admin Pricing, and Paystack Payment integration. All 22 tests passed successfully.
critical_code_review_comments: Payment gateway detection logic correctly returns 'paystack' for African countries (NG, GH, KE, ZA) and 'stripe' for non-African countries (GB, US)
Route search endpoints properly validate required parameters and return empty arrays when no routes exist
Price calculation and trip pricing endpoints correctly handle validation and return appropriate error messages for missing/invalid data
The routes database is empty - no seed routes exist. Consider adding seed data for testing with actual routes
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - routes collection is empty
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend APIs are working correctly. All payment gateway detection endpoints return correct gateway (paystack for NG/GH/KE/ZA, stripe for GB/US). Route search/calculate-price/trip-pricing endpoints work but return empty results or 'route not found' because no routes exist in database. Consider seeding the Route collection for full integration testing.
